General.Name: Hizeaero Co. Ltd
General.Description: Hizeaero Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of aerospace structures in South Korea. It offers various parts and assemblies in the areas of wing structures, sheet metals, MRO, machined parts, chemicals, 3D prints, tooling, and shot-peen. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Sacheon, South Korea.
